nls.description: List of all Clarity Sub object types
nls.name: Clarity Sub Object Types

dynamicLookup.nsql: SELECT @SELECT:(select ccn.name from cmn_captions_nls ccn, odf_objects oo2 where language_code = lang.language_code and table_name = 'ODF_OBJECTS' and pk_id = oo2.id and oo2.code = oo.parent_object_code ) + '/' + C.name:clarity_subobj_name@, @SELECT:OO.code:clarity_subobj_code@ FROM INT_INTEGRATIONMAPPINGS IM, INT_OBJECTMAPPINGS OM, ODF_OBJECTS OO, CMN_CAPTIONS_NLS C, CMN_LANGUAGES LANG WHERE @FILTER@ AND OM.clarity_object = OO.parent_object_code AND IM.ID = OM.IM_ID AND OM.IS_ACTIVE = 1 AND OO.IS_CUSTOMIZABLE = 1 AND C.PK_ID = OO.ID AND C.TABLE_NAME = 'ODF_OBJECTS' AND LANG.LANGUAGE_CODE = C.LANGUAGE_CODE AND C.LANGUAGE_CODE = @WHERE:PARAM:LANGUAGE@ AND LANG.LANGUAGE_CODE = @WHERE:PARAM:LANGUAGE@ AND (@WHERE:PARAM:USER_DEF:INTEGER:TYPE_CONSTRAIN@ = IM.ID)

SELECT @SELECT:(select ccn.name from cmn_captions_nls ccn, odf_objects oo2 where language_code = lang.language_code and table_name = 'ODF_OBJECTS' and pk_id = oo2.id and oo2.code = oo.parent_object_code ) || '/' || C.name:clarity_subobj_name@, @SELECT:OO.code:clarity_subobj_code@ FROM INT_INTEGRATIONMAPPINGS IM, INT_OBJECTMAPPINGS OM, ODF_OBJECTS OO, CMN_CAPTIONS_NLS C, CMN_LANGUAGES LANG WHERE @FILTER@ AND OM.clarity_object = OO.parent_object_code AND IM.ID = OM.IM_ID AND OM.IS_ACTIVE = 1 AND OO.IS_CUSTOMIZABLE = 1 AND C.PK_ID = OO.ID AND C.TABLE_NAME = 'ODF_OBJECTS' AND LANG.LANGUAGE_CODE = C.LANGUAGE_CODE AND C.LANGUAGE_CODE = @WHERE:PARAM:LANGUAGE@ AND LANG.LANGUAGE_CODE = @WHERE:PARAM:LANGUAGE@ AND (@WHERE:PARAM:USER_DEF:INTEGER:TYPE_CONSTRAIN@ = IM.ID)

SELECT @SELECT:(select ccn.name from cmn_captions_nls ccn, odf_objects oo2 where language_code = lang.language_code and table_name = 'ODF_OBJECTS' and pk_id = oo2.id and oo2.code = oo.parent_object_code ) || '/' || C.name:clarity_subobj_name@, @SELECT:OO.code:clarity_subobj_code@ FROM INT_INTEGRATIONMAPPINGS IM, INT_OBJECTMAPPINGS OM, ODF_OBJECTS OO, CMN_CAPTIONS_NLS C, CMN_LANGUAGES LANG WHERE @FILTER@ AND OM.clarity_object = OO.parent_object_code AND IM.ID = OM.IM_ID AND OM.IS_ACTIVE = 1 AND OO.IS_CUSTOMIZABLE = 1 AND C.PK_ID = OO.ID AND C.TABLE_NAME = 'ODF_OBJECTS' AND LANG.LANGUAGE_CODE = C.LANGUAGE_CODE AND C.LANGUAGE_CODE = @WHERE:PARAM:LANGUAGE@ AND LANG.LANGUAGE_CODE = @WHERE:PARAM:LANGUAGE@ AND (@WHERE:PARAM:USER_DEF:INTEGER:TYPE_CONSTRAIN@ = IM.ID)
